sentences.en: ...clouds which lift warm, moist air by convection high into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: ...云层通过对流把温暖湿润的空气送到高的大气层中。

sentences.en: Besides, the convection heat transfer coefficient inside water - wall tube was determined.
sentences.cn: 从而确定管内的对流换热系数.

sentences.en: Convection can be of two types: natural convection and forced convection.
sentences.cn: 对流可分为两类, 即 自然对流和强制对流.

sentences.en: Convection is the principal agent of heat transfer in the atmosphere and oceans.
sentences.cn: 对流是大气和海洋中热传输的主要方式.

sentences.en: Droplet ignition and extinction in practical combustors are strongly influenced by forced convection and turbulence.
sentences.cn: 在实际燃烧室中,液滴点火和熄火受到强迫对流和紊流的强烈影响.

sentences.en: For less active convection, cumuliform clouds grow with less rapidity.
sentences.cn: 当对流不太活跃时, 积云增长不太快.

sentences.en: In conduction and convection, energy transfer through a material medium is involved.
sentences.cn: 在传导和对流时, 能量通过某种物质媒介传递.

sentences.en: In conduction and convection, heat transfer takes place through matter.
sentences.cn: 在传导和对流, 热传递发生通过问题.

sentences.en: In convection, hot currents flow upwards.
sentences.cn: 在对流中热气流向上运动.

sentences.en: In this paper , we consider a nonconservative convection - diffusion boundary value problem.
sentences.cn: 考虑一类非守恒形式的对流扩散边值问题.

sentences.en: One of the ways to dissipate perspiration is by convection.
sentences.cn: 散发汗水的一种方法是通过对流作用.

sentences.en: Spacious rooms, Wangjiang. - South flow of convection air better!
sentences.cn: 房间宽敞, 望江. 南北 对流让空气流通更棒!

sentences.en: The boundary layer thickness is a function of the convection condition, in the melt.
sentences.cn: 边界层厚度是溶体中对流条件的函数.

sentences.en: The particle transport consists of outward diffusion and inward convection.
sentences.cn: 粒子输运由向外扩散和向内对流构成.

sentences.en: These fires create convection funnels, and throw a lot of particles into the upper atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这些火焰造成了对流漏斗，把许多微粒抛向上层大气。

sentences.en: Vertical broiling function, with high efficient heating tubes , convection operation.
sentences.cn: 特性:垂直式串烧功能, 配置高效能发热线,对衡式操作.

words.tran_cn: 对流式暖房器；对流散热器；[建] 换流器

phrases.tran_cn: 对流系数，膜层散热系数
地函对流，地幔对流；地幔对流

trans.tran_en: the movement in a gas or liquid caused by warm gas or liquid rising, and cold gas or liquid sinking
